# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily productivity and efficiency. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your routine. I'm extending this opportunity to you with an exclusive offer of $120. This price reflects the exceptional value and benefits this product provides. I look forward to hearing your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
